original_text: In the past, while Saul was king over us, you were the one who led Israel on their military campaigns. And the Lord said to you, ‘You will shepherd my people Israel, and you will become their ruler.’”
korean_text: 전에 곧 사울이 우리의 왕이 되었을 때에도 이스라엘을 거느려 출입하게 하신 분은 왕이시었고 여호와께서도 왕에게 말씀하시기를 네가 내 백성 이스라엘의 목자가 되며 네가 이스라엘의 주권자가 되리라 하셨나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: while Saul was king over us
you were the one who led Israel
And the Lord said to you
You will shepherd my people Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나의 백성 이스라엘을 목양할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and you will become their ruler
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그들의 통치자가 될 것입니다
